articles.title: Kim Jong Il Provides Field Guidance to Construction in Revolutionary Battle Sites in Area of Samjiyon
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il Provides Field Guidance to Construction in Revolutionary Battle Sites in Area of Samjiyon
 Pyongyang, March 4 (KCNA) -- General Secretary Kim Jong Il provided field guidance to the construction in the revolutionary battle sites in the area of Samjiyon.
					 The revolutionary battle sites in the area of Samjiyon have been spruced up well to the convenience of visitors by the devoted efforts of the members of the 618 Shock Brigade.
					
					Kim Jong Il first went round the statue of President Kim Il Sung newly erected in Chongbong Bivouac and various other places to learn about the construction in the battle sites and education there.
					
					 He expressed great satisfaction over the fact that the President's statue was depicted so well that he looked just the same as he did in the days of the anti-Japanese armed struggle and measures have been taken to permanently preserve the revolutionary battle sites and they are successfully managed and education is conducted well.
					
					 Saying that the President was a legendary hero and peerlessly great man who made long journeys of bloody battles for the liberation of the country and the freedom and happiness of the people, he stressed that the immortal revolutionary exploits performed by the President would always be remembered by the Korean people and shine long in the history.
					
					 Underscoring the need to spruce up well Chongbong Bivouac and effectively operate it as it is an important place for education which can greatly contribute to firmly arming the visitors to it with the WPK's revolutionary traditions, he set forth tasks and ways to do so.
					
					 Then, he provided field guidance to the lodging house of visitors and cultural and welfare facilities newly built at the side of Lake Samji.
					
					 Watching the attractive bridge built at the side to match the landscape of the beautiful lake and the soft drink shop and tourist roads constructed in keeping with the features of the alpine area, he expressed great satisfaction over the construction of the splendid structures.
					
					 He moved on to the lodging house of visitors. Making the rounds of bedrooms and supply service facilities of the house, he acquainted himself with its construction. He appreciated the efforts made by the members of the shock brigade, noting that they designed the house well to the convenience of visitors' living and ensured the best quality of the construction in the spirit of devoted service to the people.
					
					 It is necessary to ensure the highest level in construction as required by the new century when building even a single house, he said, stressing that all the structures should be built to meet the need of the era of the WPK.
					
					 Then, he commanded a bird's-eye view of the bank of Lake Samji. The area of the lake has not only turned into a huge outdoor museum but its appearance has changed into an excellent and beautiful cultural recreation ground, he noted, adding that today witnessed the realization of the desire expressed by the President to see a modern rest house for people built there after the liberation of the country when he reached the bank of the lake during the anti-Japanese armed struggle.
					
					 After going round the newly built structures, he advanced the important tasks to be fulfilled to carry out the construction in the revolutionary battle sites.
					
					 He highly appreciated the shining successes made by all the members of the shock brigade, noting that they have successfully spruced up the area of Lake Samji, a holy land of revolution, and performed astonishing miracles and exploits in the construction projects for the prosperity and development of the country including the construction of the power station and roads by displaying intense loyalty.
					
					 He stressed that the exceptionally strong enthusiasm displayed by the members of the shock brigade in the construction in the revolutionary battle sites is a manifestation of the Korean people's unshakable will to eternally add shine to the glorious revolutionary traditions, a permanent cornerstone of the Korean revolution, and accomplish the revolutionary cause of Juche that started in Mt. Paektu.
					
					 Saying that the area of Lake Samji is a holy land of revolution where sites of the President's revolutionary activities during the anti-Japanese armed struggle are concentrated and an important center for the education in the revolutionary traditions, he stressed that to spruce up the battle sites well is a sacred work for firmly defending the revolutionary traditions, an eternal treasure of the revolution, and carrying forward and developing them.
					
					 It is the unshakable will and determination of our Party to always defend, carry forward and develop the revolutionary traditions established by the President during the protracted anti-Japanese armed struggle and accomplish the revolutionary cause of Juche on the basis of these great traditions, he said, emphasizing that these shining revolutionary traditions serve as the basic source of the great mental power of the indomitable Korean people.
					
					 He underlined the need to provide better lodging houses and cultural and welfare facilities to the visitors as a large number of them are coming to the lake every year.
					
					 He stressed that it is necessary to design well structures and construct all of them to suit the topographical features of the revolutionary battle sites in order to build them in a peculiar style.
					
					 He expressed great expectation and conviction that the members of the 618 Shock Brigade would creditably perform their honorable duty in the future, too, and thus perform shining feats in the construction in the revolutionary battle sites.
					
					 He was accompanied by Kim Ki Nam, secretary of the C.C., the WPK, Kim Kyong Ho, chief secretary of the Ryanggang Provincial Committee of the WPK, Ri Je Gang and Ri Jae Il, first vice department directors of the C.C., the WPK, and Generals of the Korean People's Army Hyon Chol Hae and Ri Myong Su.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il Sends Gifts to Workers and Citizens in Manpho
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il Sends Gifts to Workers and Citizens in Manpho
 Pyongyang, March 4 (KCNA) -- General Secretary Kim Jong Il sent gifts to workers and citizens in Manpho. 
					 While giving on-the-spot guidance to different units in the city recently, he highly praised them for their great successes gained in the production of non-ferrous metal, tyre and woolen goods and catering service and city management. And he showed such profound solicitude as sending gifts to them. 
					
					 A ceremony of conveying the gifts took place in Manpho City on March 3.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il Sends Birthday Spread to Macrobian
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il Sends Birthday Spread to Macrobian
 Pyongyang, March 4 (KCNA) -- Ri Thae Hwa residing in Songyo District, Pyongyang, marked her 100th birthday.
					 Born as daughter of a tenant, she had to undergo every kind of humiliation and contempt in sorrow of being a member of the ruined nation in the past. It was after the liberation of the country by President Kim Il Sung that she could lead a happy life, being blessed with good health under the popular policy of the Workers' Party of Korea and the State and by the benefits of the public health system.
					
					 She still keeps working such as cultivating vegetable garden while leading an optimistic life.
					
					A birthday spread of benevolence sent by General Secretary Kim Jong Il was conveyed to her.

articles.title: Inter-Korean Resolution Released to Mark Anniversary of March First Popular Uprising
articles.content:
Inter-Korean Resolution Released to Mark Anniversary of March First Popular Uprising
 Pyongyang, March 4 (KCNA) -- The Council for the Reunification of the Tangun Nation from the north side and the Preparatory Committee for Joint National Event Marking March 1 and the Council for the Peaceful Reunification of the Tangun Nation from the south side made public a north-south joint resolution on Sunday, the 90th anniversary of the March First Popular Uprising.
					 The joint resolution recalled that 90 years ago all Koreans across the country valiantly rose up to regain the usurped national sovereignty braving the Japanese imperialists' suppression at the point of bayonet.
					
					 Many years have passed since the uprising, but the traces of the tragedy and damage the Koreans suffered at that time are still noticeable in this land, the resolution said, and continued:
					
					 The Japanese imperialists are distorting history to embellish their crimes and falsify the truth, far from making an honest apology, repentance and reparation for them, and persisting in their provocations, claiming that Tok Islet, part of the inviolable territory of Korea, belongs to Japan.
					
					 The national movement organizations in the north and south of Korea strongly condemn the Japanese authorities for having refused to make any apology and reparation, the resolution said, declaring that they would conduct a vigorous nationwide movement to force Japan to settle its crime-woven past and make an honest apology and reparation for it.
					
					 It stressed that they would escalate the struggle to foil the outsiders' aggression and intervention and achieve the independent and peaceful reunification of the country and the great national unity under the banner of "By our nation itself" and resolutely frustrate the separatist forces' acts of swimming against the trend toward the independent reunification, preoccupied by hostility toward fellow countrymen.
					
					 All the national movement organizations in the north and the south and overseas will unite close with one another irrespective of ideology, political view, religious belief and interests of groupings to defend and implement the historic June 15 joint declaration and October 4 declaration and thus make a positive contribution to intensifying the movement for national reunification, the resolution said.

articles.title: Congratulations to Cuban Foreign Minister
articles.content:
Congratulations to Cuban Foreign Minister
 Pyongyang, March 4 (KCNA) -- Foreign Minister Pak Ui Chun Wednesday sent a congratulatory message to Bruno Rodriguez Parrilla on his appointment as foreign minister of Cuba. 
					 Expressing the belief that the excellent friendly and cooperative relations existing between the two countries would grow stronger in the future, too, the message wished him success in the performance of his new duty.

articles.title: Annual Meeting of DPRK-Cuba Solidarity Committee Held
articles.content:
Annual Meeting of DPRK-Cuba Solidarity Committee Held
Pyongyang, March 4 (KCNA) -- An annual meeting of the DPRK-Cuba Solidarity Committee took place in Pyongyang on Wednesday.
					 Present there were Minister of Education Kim Yong Jin, chairman of the DPRK-Cuba Solidarity Committee, Paek Yong Ho, vice-chairman of the Korean Committee for Cultural Relations with Foreign Countries, and members of the DPRK-Cuba Solidarity Committee. 
					
					 Jose Manuel Galego Montano, Cuban ambassador to the DPRK, and embassy officials were on hand.
					
					 It reviewed the work done by the committee over the last one year to boost the friendship and solidarity with the Cuban people who have advanced under the uplifted banner of socialism while foiling the imperialists' sanctions, blockade and moves to isolate and stifle their country and defending its sovereignty and revolutionary gains under the leadership of the Communist Party of Cuba and discussed its action plan for this year.

articles.title: Newly Discovered Poems and Songs Created during Anti-Japanese Armed Struggle
articles.content:
Newly Discovered Poems and Songs Created during Anti-Japanese Armed Struggle
Pyongyang, March 4 (KCNA) -- Poems and songs created during the anti-Japanese armed struggle in praise of President Kim Il Sung have been found in Antu County and other areas of northeast China.
					 The poems and songs reflect with deep emotion the ideological sense of the Korean people who entrust all their destiny and future entirely to the President, the sun of the nation.
					
					 The work "General Kim Is a Hero" sings of their unswerving belief that General Kim Il Sung is the greatest commander who leads the formidable enemy by the nose, though the Japanese imperialists describe the Korean People's Revolutionary Army (KPRA) as a "drop in the ocean".
					
					 Such works as "The General Calls Us", "Let Us Fight with Belief Only in the General", "The Ten-point Programme of the Association for the Restoration of the Fatherland", "Pent-up Rancor Is Wreaked", "Song of Liberation" and "Water Mill" mirror the heightened spiritual world of the people who have risen in the decisive all-people resistance under the leadership of the President.
					
					 Among the newly discovered works are "The Korean People's Revolutionary Army", "General's Guerrilla Unit", "Magpie", "Song of Millstone" and "Tharyong of Rice-cake". They vividly and truthfully sing of the spiritual and moral virtue of the KPRA founded by the President and formed with fine sons and daughters of the people and of its kindred relations with the people.
					
					 In particular, "Well-Seasoned Spring Herbs" and "Acorn Jelly" impressively show that the best wishes for the good health of the President is the core in consolidating the blood ties between the KPRA and the people.
					
					 The newly discovered poems and songs carrying the ardent reverence of the then people for President Kim Il Sung are popular among the servicepersons of the Korean People's Army and people.

articles.title: Success of Marathoners in New Century
articles.content:
Success of Marathoners in New Century
Pyongyang, March 4 (KCNA) -- Marathoners of the Democratic People's Republic of Korea have proved themselves in international contests in new century with a firm will to display the mettle of socialist Korea.
					Ham Pong Sil (female) won the gold medal in the women's half marathon game of the 21st Universiad held in Beijing in September, Juche 90 (2001) and also won the women's marathon game of the 14th Asiad held in October 2002.
					
					Kim Kum Ok came first in the 11th Asian Marathon Championships held in Hong Kong in February 2008 following 10th Asian Marathon Championships held in Beijing in October 2006. She also won the gold medal in the women's half marathon game of the 24th Universiad held in Bangkok in August 2007.
					
					Ri Kum Song (male) bagged the gold medal in the 26th Macao International Marathon Race, Phyo Un Suk (female) won the consecutive 25th and 26th Macao international marathon races held in December 2006 and 2007.
					
					Marathoners of the DPRK won more than 60 gold, silver and copper medals in over 40 international games in the new century.

articles.title: "Among the People" Vol. 78 Off Press
articles.content:
"Among the People" Vol. 78 Off Press
Pyongyang, March 4 (KCNA) -- The Workers' Party of Korea Publishing House brought out Volume 78 of "Among the People", a collection of reminiscences.
					 The book contains 18 reminiscences showing President Kim Il Sung's noble intention of believing in people as in Heaven, his leadership characterized by patriotic devotion and noble popular personality. 
					
					 Reminiscences titled "In the days when the President was translating into reality the line of simultaneously pushing ahead with the economic construction and defence upbuilding" and "When recollecting the days when the history of lighting for film production began" tell stories that the President firmly believed in the working class and encouraged it to stand in the van of the struggle to carry out the line of the Party and devoted his efforts to the development of the lighting technology for film production after the liberation of the country.
					
					 Reminiscences titled "Inerasable footprints left in the Taehongdan revolutionary battle site" and "Unforgettable memory of youthhood" recount touching stories about what profound loving care the President showed for the lecturers in the revolutionary battle site and young officials of the Suphung Power Station.
					
					 Reminiscences titled "The problem of transport for the construction of the Wiwon Power Station was thus solved" and "A day the President spent for coal miners" tell stories that the President indicated ways of settling the problem of transport on the spot and encouraged the coal miners in Anju to boost the coal production.
					
					 "Visiting our shop" and "With the desire to get our people dressed better" and other reminiscences deal with the moving stories that the President showed such care as making sure that the production of varieties of knit wear was increased and the commodity supply was improved, exerting great efforts for improving the standard of the people's living. 
					
					 Reminiscences titled "Helping the bereaved children to firmly defend the class position" and "Remembering the soldier who died long ago" impressively tell stories that the President took care of the bereaved children so that they might defend their hometowns associated with the blood shed by their parents and trained revolutionary soldiers out of noble sense of obligation and showed warm loving care for them even after their death. 
					
					 The book also contains reminiscences dealing with the noble personality of the President who devoted his all to the rising generation and highly praised an official in the field of railways who devotedly performed his duty for several decades after successfully sprucing up his railway station.

articles.title: U.S. Termed Worst Human Rights Abuser
articles.content:
U.S. Termed Worst Human Rights Abuser
Pyongyang, March 4 (KCNA) -- The U.S. is apt to talk about the "human rights issues" of other countries and give "advices" to them, behaving as if it were "a human rights judge."
					 Rodong Sinmun Wednesday in a signed commentary terms this behavior very ridiculous and ludicrous, adding that the U.S. is the worst human rights abuser in the world. 
					
					 Citing just one example proving this fact, the commentary notes: 
					
					When a British inmate in the prison at U.S. navy base in Guantanamo recently filed a suit in the British High Court against the torture by U.S. soldiers there, the U.S. authorities asked the UK to destroy the evidence produced by him. 
					
					 The U.S. considered to be "a close friend" of the UK raised such rude demand, hurting its feelings. This behavior of the U.S. is little short of admitting its human rights abuses by itself as the proverb says the faulty stands on his guard.
					
					 No wonder, Amnesty International put the U.S. on top of the list of the countries which recorded five worst human rights abuses over the last more than four decades.
					
					 It is the U.S. whose streets are crowded with people denied any elementary right to existence and where racial discrimination prevails and cases of murder are reported in an unbroken chain. 
					
					 The U.S. is the chieftain of aggression and state-sponsored terrorism as it wantonly tramples down upon the sovereignty and dignity of other countries and fire missiles and drop bombs to kill even women and children without hesitation.
					
					 No matter how loudly the U.S. may trumpet about "defence of human rights," it can never cover up its true colors as the worst human rights abuser in the world and common enemy of mankind.
					
					 The U.S. had better stop making vain efforts to conceal its crimes and true colors as kingpin of human rights abuses with hypocritical "human rights" rhetoric but admit those crimes and face the world community's stern judgment.

articles.title: Projected U.S.-S. Korea Joint Military Exercises Flailed
articles.content:
Projected U.S.-S. Korea Joint Military Exercises Flailed
 Pyongyang, March 4 (KCNA) -- Shortly ago, the south Korea-U.S. Combined Forces Command officially announced that it would stage large-scale Key Resolve and Foal Eagle joint military exercises across south Korea from March 9 to 20.
					 Rodong Sinmun Wednesday observes in a signed commentary carried in this regard:
					
					 The projected joint military exercises are large-scale DPRK-targeted war exercises which replaced the codename of RSOI. They are very provocative saber-rattling simulating attacks on all parts of the DPRK through coordinated operations with the puppet army after rapidly hurling U.S. reinforcements to the Korean front from overseas in case of "contingency." 
					
					 The warmongers seek to mislead public opinion at home and abroad, raving that the exercises assume no provocative nature and they are aimed at defense. But with nothing can they cover up their aggressive nature.
					
					 Looking back on history, all the joint military exercises staged by warmongers at home and abroad under various codenames were without exception aimed at launching a nuclear war. They escalated military confrontation and tension on the Korean Peninsula to the extreme pitch and gravely threatened the peace and stability of the country. The projected war maneuvers assume more provocative and dangerous nature as the north-south relations were brought to the phase of total collapse and the situation on the peninsula has become so acute that a war may break out any moment.
					
					 The sinister plan for the reckless war exercises targeted against the DPRK announced by the warmongers at home and abroad defying the serious concern and strong opposition of the public at home and abroad proved that they are not interested in the detente and peace on the Korean Peninsula and the normalization of the inter-Korean relations at all but only seek to realize their wild ambition for a war against the DPRK.
					
					 The Lee Myung Bak group of traitors should never forget that the revolutionary armed forces of the DPRK are keeping themselves fully ready for all-out confrontation with the highest degree of vigilance.
					
					 Should the group finally perpetrate military provocations defying the repeated warnings of the DPRK, it will never be able to escape the fate of a forlorn wandering spirit in face of its merciless counterstrike.

articles.title: U.S. and Its Followers Urged to Stop Their War Moves against DPRK
articles.content:
U.S. and Its Followers Urged to Stop Their War Moves against DPRK
Pyongyang, March 4 (KCNA) -- The U.S. and its followers should stop running amuck, bearing in mind that the powerful military countermeasures of the revolutionary armed forces of the DPRK fully ready for all-out confrontation will be implemented by decisive and merciless actions which can hardly be countered by any sophisticated means, and stop at once their reckless military provocations against the DPRK, urges Rodong Sinmun Wednesday in a signed article.
					 The article cites facts to prove that the U.S. imperialists and the warmongers of the south Korean puppet army have stepped up the moves for a new war against the DPRK since the outset of the year while openly calling for tightened "sanctions" and "use of military force" against it.
					
					 The U.S. is talking about "improved relations" and "dialogue" with the DPRK but, in actuality, is seeking to stifle it by force of arms, the article notes, and goes on: 
					
					 The war hysteria of the U.S. bellicose forces is a revelation of megalomania. The U.S. boasts of "upper hand of strength" but its military strength is not matchless. 
					
					 The U.S. imperialists' reckless military provocations against the DPRK are bound to go bankrupt.
					
					  The DPRK has the invincible political and military strength of the army and the people rallied close around Kim Jong Il, the great brilliant commander of Songun. It also has the single-minded unity of the leader, the party and the masses more powerful than a nuclear weapon. And it has powerful military deterrent, capacity for self-defence strong enough to shatter any attempt of the imperialist reactionaries for aggression.
					
					  A trait of attaching importance to the military affairs has been firmly established throughout the society and all the people are under arms and the whole country has turned into a fortress.
					
					 The U.S. has neither guessed the inexhaustible mental power and strength of the army and people of the DPRK nor can it do so.
					
					 They value peace and do not want a war. But if the enemy intrudes into the territory of their country even 0.001 mm, they will deal a thousand-fold retaliatory blow at it with all their potentials mobilized.

articles.title: KCNA Blasts Japan's Moves to Seize Tok Islet
articles.content:
KCNA Blasts Japan's Moves to Seize Tok Islet
Pyongyang, March 4 (KCNA) -- The Japanese reactionaries have become all the more undisguised in their moves to seize Tok Islet.
					 A typical example is the "day of Takeshima" which was observed in Shimane Prefecture recently as an "annual event" despite domestic and foreign protest.
					
					 Those who spoke at the function let loose outbursts that Japan should build up "international public opinion" as regards the issue of "Takeshima" and it should increase budget for it. 
					
					 This cannot but be a gangster-like move to grab the territory of other country.
					
					 Tok Islet is part of the inviolable territory of Korea from the historical, geographical and international legal points of view from A to Z.
					
					 This notwithstanding, the Japanese reactionaries assert that Tok Islet belongs to Japan, marking the "day of Takeshima" as an "annual event" since its institution in March 2005.
					
					 Lurking behind this is their sinister intention to occupy the islet and plunder it of its rich underground and aquatic resources and, furthermore, use the islet situated in the militarily sensitive place as a springboard from which to attain their wild ambition for staging a comeback to Korea.
					
					 It is a trite trick of the imperialists to spark off territorial disputes and mobilize armed forces under those pretexts and thus provoke a war of aggression.
					
					 By persistently asserting that the islet belongs to Japan it seeks to establish a justification for staging a comeback to Korea.
					
					 It is foolhardy of Japan to try to grab the islet.
					
					 The DPRK will never tolerate such moves.

articles.title: Japanese Reactionaries' Disgusting Diplomacy Slammed
articles.content:
Japanese Reactionaries' Disgusting Diplomacy Slammed
 Pyongyang, March 4 (KCNA) -- Japanese politicians are preoccupied by the humiliating and solicitation diplomacy, lost to shame and bereft of even iota of self-esteem, observes Minju Joson Wednesday in a signed commentary.
					 It goes on:
					
					 The Japanese reactionaries busied themselves after inviting the U.S. secretary of State to Japan recently. They solicited the U.S. support and understanding of the "abduction issue" and asserted they expected its cooperation in settling the issue.
					
					 By nature Japanese politicians have neither independent political ability nor quality. They are only nervous about how they can meet their interests with the help of others. 
					
					 The Japanese minister of Defense went the lengths of making remarks defending the U.S. A-bomb attacks on Japan which imposed the worst nuclear disaster upon it in history. Judging from this, there is no need to guess what extent the Japanese politicans' sycophancy and submission to the U.S. have reached. 
					
					 It was not without reason that the Japanese reactionaries ran the whole gamut of flattery during the U.S. secretary of State's junket to their country, imploring for cooperation in settling the "abduction issue."
					
					 They are irritated at whether there is any change in the U.S. policy toward Japan after the emergence of the new U.S. administration.
					
					 In a word, Japan is very much concerned about any possible change in the U.S. attitude toward Japan.
					
					 Some days ago the Japanese chief executive blared that he confirmed that the tightened Japan-U.S. alliance has become a foundation of the U.S. diplomacy. This reflected his mentality.
					
					 The Japanese reactionaries are sadly mistaken if they calculate everything will be okay when they boost the relations with the U.S. and garner its support and cooperation.
					
					 Everything in the world is not decided by the U.S. and the key to settling the issue of the DPRK-Japan relations, in particular, is not in the hands of the U.S.
					
					 The Japanese reactionaries will never be able to shake off their ill fame but repeatedly suffer disgrace should they recklessly dance to the tune of others.

articles.title: Lee Myung Bak's Violation of Democracy and Human Rights under Fire
articles.content:
Lee Myung Bak's Violation of Democracy and Human Rights under Fire
Pyongyang, March 4 (KCNA) -- Traitor Lee Myung Bak can never evade stern punishment by history and the nation for the crime he has committed by turning south Korea into a veritable hell where democracy and human rights are wantonly violated through "pragmatic fascist" rule, says Rodong Sinmun Wednesday in a signed article. It goes on:
					 Since his seizure of power the traitor has converted south Korea into a dark society devoid of democratic freedom and rights and a graveyard of human rights where dictatorship and repression are rampant.
					
					 The patriotic democratic forces which called for national reconciliation and unity and reunification through alliance with the north have been systematically suppressed and stamped out, progressive media has been gagged by the fascist tyranny and people's struggle for right to existence has become a target of harsh suppression. This is a stark reality of south Korea. The recent murder of evacuees in Ryongsan, Seoul was a vivid expression of the hard reality in south Korea, a tundra of democracy and human rights.
					
					 The article cites facts to prove that the treacherous policy pursued by traitor Lee is a reactionary one speaking for the interests of a handful of big businesses and ultra-right conservatives and actively supporting them in all fabrics of social life including politics, economy and culture and a fascist dictatorial policy ruthlessly violating the independent rights of people by dint of law and violence.
					
					 The Lee Myung Bak group has so far incited confrontation talking about "human rights issue" of someone whenever an opportunity presented itself. But it was nothing but shameless sophism of the worst human rights abuser and the regime keen on abusing human rights.
					
					 The Lee group has neither justification nor face to talk about human rights as it pursues unpopular misrule and fascist rule while depriving the toiling masses of their elementary democratic freedom and right to existence.

articles.title: U.S. to Stage Drill for Express Delivery of War Hardware in S. Korea
articles.content:
U.S. to Stage Drill for Express Delivery of War Hardware in S. Korea
 Pyongyang, March 4 (KCNA) -- The U.S. imperialists mull staging a drill for the express delivery of war hardware to the U.S. reinforcements in its military base in Waegwan, North Kyongsang Province on March 5, prior to the projected Key Resolve and Foal Eagle joint military exercises.
					 This was announced by the 8th U.S. Army Command in south Korea on March 2.
					
					 The U.S. imperialist warmongers disclosed that the projected exercise was aimed at the express delivery to the U.S. reinforcements of tanks, firepower equipment and other war hardware already deployed in south Korea.
					
					 The U.S. reinforcements are expected to be deployed on the front and stage live shell firing drills while the joint military exercises are under way. To this end, the U.S. reinforcements including Striker unit are to be hurled into south Korea one after another prior to the commencement of the military exercises. 
					
					 Such war hysteria of the U.S. imperialist warmongers glaringly reveals the bellicose nature of the Key Resolve and Foal Eagle to attack the DPRK.

articles.title: Projected Retrogressive Revision of Textbooks Protested in S. Korea
articles.content:
Projected Retrogressive Revision of Textbooks Protested in S. Korea
 Pyongyang, March 4 (KCNA) -- The preparatory committee for the "Truth and Justice" Joint Measure Committee for Solution to the Textbook Problem, the History Teachers Association and other civic and public organizations of south Korea held a seminar in Seoul on Feb. 24, at which they condemned the Lee Myung Bak group of traitors' scheme to retrogressively revise textbooks.
					 Speakers at the seminar disclosed that the campaign for the retrogressive revision of textbooks has become evermore pronounced since it started with the revision of history textbooks after the emergence of the Lee "government."
					
					 They accused the "government" of seeking to retrogressively revise the textbooks on all social subjects, at a time when the controversy on the distortion of history textbooks is getting unabated.
					
					 Measures should be taken for education, they held, demanding that an independent "committee for educational courses" involving all fabrics of society be formed to this end.

articles.title: Resignation of Lee Group Urged by Overseas Koreans
articles.content:
Resignation of Lee Group Urged by Overseas Koreans
 Pyongyang, March 4 (KCNA) -- The United Confederation of Koreans in Russia (Russian Kothongryon) issued a statement titled "The Lee Myung Bak group should step down from power without delay" on Feb. 27.
					 The statement recalled that the Lee group recorded the most shameful crimes without parallel in the world by its treacherous and unpopular misrule during the first year of its office.
					
					 What cannot be overlooked in the crimes committed by the Lee group is that it adopted "no nukes, opening and 3,000 dollars," a theory of confrontation against reunification, as its "policy towards the north" and has viciously pursued the confrontation with fellow countrymen, it said, and went on:
					
					 The June 15 joint declaration and the October 4 declaration are a great platform and an action programme for the independent reunification in the new century and their significance, validity and vitality have already been proved to the full in practice.
					
					 However, the Lee group maliciously slandered and defamed those historical declarations and went the lengths of remarking that "there can never be reunification based on the June 15 joint declaration."
					
					 What is the most dangerous of its anti-reunification and treacherous crimes is that it has unhesitatingly made such outbursts as "contingency" and "preemptive attack," imprudently defiling the dignified system in the DPRK.
					
					 Indeed, the crimes committed by the Lee group during one year of its office far surpass the crimes committed by the successive conservative regimes in the past decades, and their consequences are monstrous.
					
					 Recognizing that the inter-Korean relations can never be prevented from going to collapse and the nation is fated to meet disasters as long as traitor Lee and his group are allowed to stay in power, the Russian Kothongryon strongly demands that the present south Korean ruling forces step down from power at once.

articles.title: February Holiday Celebrated Abroad
articles.content:
February Holiday Celebrated Abroad
Pyongyang, March 4 (KCNA) -- Meetings, film shows and photo exhibitions were held in Laos, Pakistan and Tajikistan from Feb. 10 to 13 to celebrate the birthday of General Secretary 
					Kim Jong Il.
					  Displayed in the venues of photo exhibitions were works of Kim Jong Il, photos showing his immortal exploits and photos introducing the Korean people in the efforts to build a great prosperous and powerful nation.
					
					 Speeches were made at the events.
					
					 The chairman of the Laos-Korea Friendship Association said that under the wise leadership of the Workers' Party of Korea headed by Kim Jong Il, the Korean people have firmly defended the sovereignty of the country and made great successes in socialist construction. All these achievements are attributable to the political and ideological might of all the servicepersons and people who are united as one in mind around their leader, with absolute respect and trust in him, he added.
					
					 The chairman of the National Workers' Party of Pakistan said that socialist Korea is now growing stronger thanks to the outstanding and tested leadership of Kim Jong Il, the great sun of the 21st century.
					
					 The first secretary of the Sogd Regional Committee of the Communist Party of Tajikistan expressed belief that the Korean people would certainly build a great prosperous and powerful nation and reunify the country in the near future under the leadership of Kim Jong Il.
					
					Appreciated at the film shows were Korean films dealing with the Songun leadership feats of
						 Kim Jong Il.
					
					 A message of greetings to Kim Jong Il was adopted at the meeting held in Pakistan.

articles.title: DPRK's Songun Politics Praised in Peru
articles.content:
DPRK's Songun Politics Praised in Peru
 Pyongyang, March 4 (KCNA) -- The Peruvian Group for the Study of Kimilsungism issued a bulletin titled "Songun Politics Is Almighty Sword of Justice" on Feb. 20.
					 The bulletin said in an article that the U.S.-led imperialists' high-handed and arbitrary practices are posing a serious threat to the sovereignty of each country and nation and the global peace and security. So, it is quite natural that many statesmen around the world are finding a way out of such practices in the DPRK's Songun politics, it added.
					
					 To live and develop in an independent way is the aspiration and desire of all countries and nations, the article said, and went on:
					
					 The imperialists are putting political, military and economic pressure upon those countries aspiring after independence.
					
					 Under this situation, it is necessary to further increase the self-reliant defence capability in order to protect the sovereignty of each country from the imperialists' interference and encroachment.
					
					 The Songun politics gives prefect answer to such demand.
					
					 The vitality of this politics has been clearly evidenced in the experience of the DPRK which foiled the offensive of the imperialist allied forces and reliably defended its system in the grim trials unprecedented in history towards the close of the last century.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il dirige la labor de construccion en Samjiyon
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il dirige la labor de construccion en Samjiyon
Pyongyang, 4 de marzo (ATCC) -- El Dirigente Kim Jong Il, Secretario General del Partido del Trabajo de Corea y Presidente del Comite de Defensa Nacional de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, dirigio sobre el terreno las labores constructivas del Lugar de Batalla Revolucionaria de la Zona de Samjiyon.
					Este lugar fue construido mejor y comodamente para la excursion gracias a los abnegados esfuerzos de los miembros de la Brigada 18 de Junio.
					
					  Ante todo, recorrio la estatua de bronce del Presidente Kim Il Sung, nuevamente erguida en el Campamento de Chongbong y otros lugares y se cercioro del estado de construccion del lugar de batalla y de la labor de educacion.
					
					  Se mostro muy satisfecho de que describieron bien la estatua de bronce del Presidente como la figura del periodo de la lucha armada antijaponesa y realizan bien la administracion y la labor educativa tras tomar las medidas para conservar eternamente el lugar de batalla revolucionaria.
					
					  El Presidente fue el heroe legendario y gran hombre simpar quien abrio un largisimo camino de batallas ensangrentadas para la restauracion de la patria y para la libertad y la felicidad del pueblo, dijo el Dirigente y destaco que sus inmortales hazanas revolucionarias se conservaran eternamente en el corazon del pueblo coreano y brillaran para siempre en la historia.
					
					  Senalo que deben acondicionar bien y gestionar con eficacia el Campamento de Chongbong, importante base de educacion que contribuira grandemente a armar firmemente con las tradiciones revolucionarias del Partido del Trabajo de Corea a los excursionistas quienes visitan dicho campamento e ilumino las tareas y los medios para el particular.
					
					  Acto seguido, el Dirigente dirigio sobre el terreno el albergue de peregrinos y los establecimientos culturales y de servicio publico, nuevamente construidos.
					
					  Al ver el puente elegante construido a la orilla del lago Samji de acuerdo con el paisaje natural, el quiosco construido conveniente a la zona montanosa y la carretera de excursion, expreso gran satisfaccion de haber construido las excelentes creaciones.
					
					  El Dirigente visito el nuevo albergue de peregrinos.
					
					  Al recorrer los dormitorios y establecimientos de servicio publico se entero del estado de construccion y elogio los esfuerzos de los miembros de la brigada diciendo que estos con el abnegado espiritu de servicio al pueblo hicieron bien disenos comodos conforme a la vida de los excursionistas  y aseguraron en el maximo nivel la calidad de la construccion.
					
					  Al construir una vivienda debemos asegurar el nivel maximo de acuerdo con la demanda del nuevo siglo, senalo y continuo que hay que construir todos los edificios conforme al gusto de la epoca del Partido del Trabajo.
					
					  El Dirigente miro la orilla del lago Samji.
					
					  Subrayo que la zona de Samjiyon se convirtio en el gran museo al aire libre y en el hermoso lugar de reposo cultural y apunto que se realizo al fin el deseo del Presidente Kim Il Sung, quien en esta orilla, en el periodo de la lucha armada antijaponesa, dijo que despues de ser restaurado el pais, levantaria aqui excelente casa de reposo del pueblo.
					
					Luego de recorrer las edificios arquitectonicos nuevamente construidos, el Dirigente presento las tareas programaticas que se presentan en la construccion del lugar de batalla revolucionaria.
					
					Destaco que al manifestar la ardiente fidelidad, los miembros de la brigada 18 de Junio acondicionaron magnificamente la zona de Samjiyon, sagrado lugar de la revolucion y crearon los sorprendentes milagros y proezas en la construccion de la central hidroelectrica, carretera y otras labores constructivas para la prosperidad del pais, y evaluo altamente los orgullosos exitos logrados por todos los miembros de la brigada.
					
					Anadio que el ardiente entusiasmo de ellos manifestado de modo extraordinario en la construccion del lugar de batalla revolucionaria deviene una manifestacion de la ferrea voluntad de nuestro pueblo de glorificar eternamente las gloriosas tradiciones revolucionarias, cimiento eterno de la revolucion coreana y llevar a feliz termino la causa revolucionaria del Juche iniciada en el monte Paektu.
					
					Ratifico que la zona de Samjiyon es el sagrado lugar de la revolucion que guarda la historia de las actividades revolucionarias del Presidente en el periodo de la lucha armada antijaponesa y el importante centro de la educacion en las tradiciones revolucionarias y asevero que acondicionarlo bien constituye un trabajo honroso para defender resueltamente y continuar las tradiciones revolucionarias, tesoro eterno de la revolucion.
					
					Se refirio a que defender y heredar para siempre las grandes tradiciones revolucionarias creadas por el Presidente en el largo periodo de la lucha armada antijaponesa y llevar a feliz termino la causa revolucionaria del Juche basandose en estas grandes tradiciones es la inconmovible voluntad y decision de nuestro partido y recalco que esas brillantes tradiciones revolucionarias de nuestro partido sirven de un fuente fundamental de la gran fuerza espiritual de nuestro pueblo indoblegable.
					
					Indico que conforme a que numerosos excursionistas vienen anualmente a Samjiyon, es preciso ofrecer bien albergues e instalaciones culturales y de servicio publico.
					
					Destaco que para acondicionar de modo especifico los lugares de batalla revolucionaria, hay que hacer bien disenos y construir todas las edificaciones arquitectonicas conforme a las caracteristicas zonales.
					
					Expresogran esperanza y conviccion de que los miembros de la brigada 18 de Junio cumpliran magnificamente su honroso deber tambien en el futuro y registraran brillantes proezas en la construccion del lugar de batalla revolucionaria.
					
					Le acompanaron el secretario del CC del PTC Kim Ki Nam, el secretario responsable del Comite del PTC en la Provincia de Ryanggang Kim Kyong Ho, los primeros subjefes de departamento del CC del PTC Ri Je Gang y Ri Jae Il y los generales deejercito del EPC Hyon Chol Hae y Ri Myong Su.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il envia regalos a ciudadanos de Manpho
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il envia regalos a ciudadanos de Manpho
Pyongyang, 4 de marzo (ATCC) -- El Dirigente Kim Jong Il envio regalos a los obreros y otros ciudadanos de Manpho.
					  Hace poco, el Dirigente dirigio en el terreno varias unidades de esa urbe y aprecio altamente los grandes exitos logrados en la produccion de metales no ferrosos, neumaticos y articulos de lana y en el servicio gastronomico y la urbanizacion.
					
					  Tuvo lugar el dia 3 en esa ciudad la ceremonia de entrega de presentes.

articles.title: Publicada resolucion conjunta Norte-Sur de Corea
articles.content:
Publicada resolucion conjunta Norte-Sur de Corea
Pyongyang, 4 de marzo (ATCC) -- Con motivo del 90o aniversario del Levantamiento Popular del Primero de Marzo, el Consejo para la Reunificacion de la Nacion de Tangun de la parte nortena y la entidad homologa de la parte surena del Comite Preparatorio para el Acto Nacional Conjunto por el Primero de Marzo hicieron publica el dia primero la resolucion conjunta Norte-Sur.
					Hace 90 anos, se sublevaron todos los coreanos en todos los confines del territorio nacional para recuperar la soberania nacional arrebatada sin doblegarse ante el fusil y la bayoneta del imperialismo japones, recuerda el documento y continua:
					
					Aunque transcurrio mucho tiempo desde ese evento, siguen frescas todavia en la tierra patria las huellas de calamidades y danos sufridos por la nacion coreana.
					
					En vez de pedir disculpas, reflexionar y recompensar con sinceridad sus actos criminales cometidos en el pasado, el imperialismo japones tergiversa la historia para dar tinte positivo a estos crimenes y ocultar la verdad y suele provocar a la nacion coreana insistiendo absurdamente en que la isla Tok, tierra propia de Corea, es japonesa.
					
					Las entidades del movimiento nacional de la parte Norte y la Sur denuncian fuertemente a las autoridades del pais isleno que hasta hoy, no piden disculpas ni indemnizan.
					
					Libraran con audacia la campana pannacional para forzar a Japon a liquidar su pasado lleno de crimenes y pedir disculpas y recompensar con sinceridad.
					
					Ademas, bajo la bandera de "Entre nosotros, los connacionales", ampliaran la lucha por rechazar la agresion y la injerencia de las fuerzas foraneas y lograr la reunificacion independiente y pacifica de la patria y la gran unidad nacional.
					
					Frustraran tajantemente los actos de las fuerzas anti-reunificacion, que desafian a la corriente hacia la reunificacion independiente cautivadas por el sentimiento hostil a los compatriotas.
					
					Todas las entidades de movimiento nacional del Norte, el Sur y ultramar, unidas firmemente por encima de las diferencias de ideas, criterios politicos, religiones e intereses de si mismas, ejecutaran cabalmente la historica Declaracion Conjunta del 15 de Junio y la Declaracion del 4 de Octubre para contribuir mucho a la intensificacion del movimiento por la reunificacion de la patria.

articles.title: Sesionada reunion anual del Comite de Solidaridad Corea-Cuba
articles.content:
Sesionada reunion anual del Comite de Solidaridad Corea-Cuba
Pyongyang, 4 de marzo (ATCC) -- Tuvo lugar este miercoles en esta capital la reunion anual del Comite de Solidaridad Corea-Cuba.
					En la ocasion estuvieron presentes el ministro de Educacion Kim Yong Jin, quien es presidente de dicho comite, y otros miembros incluyendo el vicepresidente del Comite de Relaciones Culturales con el Extranjero, Paek Yong Ho.
					
					Ademas, participaron el embajador Jose Manuel Galego Montano y otros miembros de la embajada cubana en Corea.
					
					En la sesion se hizo balance de los trabajos realizados el ano pasado por el comite en aras de la amistad y solidaridad con el pueblo cubano que bajo la direccion del Partido Comunista de Cuba, avanza con la bandera del socialismo en alto frustrando la sancion y el bloqueo de los imperialistas y sus maniobras para aislar y aplastar a Cuba y defendiendo con firmeza la soberania del pais y las conquistas de la revolucion.
					
					Igualmente, se debatio el plan de actividades para este ano.
